info.description:
branchless 2D implementation/demo of "A Fast Voxel Traversal Algorithm for Ray Tracing" by Amanatides & Woo (http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download?doi=10.1.1.42.3443&rep=rep1&type=pdf)

Hold and drag the cursor to define a ray.
info.name: A Fast Voxel Traversal Algorithm

renderpass.name: Image
